Add new entity. CIAB established by Local Law 38 of 2012 (Responsible Banking Act) and codified in NYC Charter §1524-a. Active 2014-2015 conducting banking needs assessments. Enabling law struck down in 2015 (NY Bankers Assn v. City of NY) as preempted by federal/state law. Board still exists in Charter (current as of Nov 2025) and listed on various rosters but functionally dormant with no evidence of meetings/reports post-2015.Charter §1524-a: 2015 activity: Court decision
